## Checklist

- [ ] I've read [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] The slug follows naming rules (lowercase, alphanumeric, hyphens only)
- [ ] The destination URL is valid and accessible
- [ ] This is not a malicious, spam, or inappropriate link
- [ ] I've added my entry to `redirects.json`
- [ ] I've run `node validate.js` to check for errors (optional)
